ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes
ygData.msgSnippet: The next expansion is also supposed to introduce Intelligent weapons as well where when you have the weapon equipped it will gain xp  as well and is supposed
ygData.messageBody:
The next expansion is also supposed to introduce Intelligent weapons as well
where when you have the weapon equipped it will gain xp as well and is
supposed to develop a personality of some kind as well

Halyburton
70 Barb Fateseer
Legion of Vengeance
Saryrn
(aka Kwasi)
----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 03, 2005 11:27 PM
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes


> The only thing that I can remember is that you can play a monster instead
> of your character. It said you can group with friends lower level than you
> by playing a monster that is in their level range while getting xp for
> your character.
> I really wish they would focus on fixing the memory leaks and get rid of
> damage misreporting instead of making a new expansion.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> ======= At 2005-08-03, 13:08:00 you wrote: =======
>
>>I haven't seen anything on the new expansion yet. What are some of the
>>features?
>>
>>---------------------------------------
>>
>>
>>Cool!
>>By the way, what does everyone think of the new expansion that is coming
>>out?
>>luv,
>>
>
>
>
>
